channel.title: CVE Feed for simplesamlphp -- SimpleSAMLphp
channel.description: The latest CVEs for simplesamlphp -- SimpleSAMLphp

item.title: CVE-2011-4625|2024-08-07T00:09:19.359Z -- simplesamlphp -- simplesamlphp
item.description: simplesamlphp before 1.6.3 (squeeze) and before 1.8.2 (sid) incorrectly handles XML encryption which could allow remote attackers to decrypt or forge messages.
